reactClassComponent.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system

reactReduxComponent.description: Creates a React component class connected to redux

reactReduxDispatchComponent.description: Creates a React component class connected to redux with dispatch

reactJustClassComponent.description: Creates a React component class with ES6 module system

reactClassComponentPropTypes.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and ES6 module system

reactClassComponentWithMethods.description: Creates a React component class with PropTypes and all lifecycle methods and ES6 module system

reactWithWebpackDefaults.description: Creates a React component class with constructor, empty state, proptypes and export in ES6 module system without imports. (Mostly used when React, Proptypes are provided by webpack provide plugin)

reactPureComponent.description: Creates a React pure component class with PropTypes and ES6 module system

reactStateless.description: Creates a stateless React component without PropTypes and ES6 module system

reactStatelessProps.description: Creates a stateless React component with PropTypes and ES6 module system

reactMemo.description: Creates a memoized stateless React component without PropTypes and ES6 module system

reactMemoProps.description: Creates a memoized stateless React component with PropTypes and ES6 module system

flowStatelessComponent.description: Creates a stateless React component with FlowTypes and ES6 module system

flowStatelessFunction.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function with FlowTypes

flowClassComponent.description: Creates a React component class with FlowTypes

reactStatelessFunction.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function without PropTypes

reactStatelessFunctionProps.description: Creates a stateless React component as a named function with PropTypes

reactStatelessImplicitReturn.description: Creates a stateless React component without PropTypes and ES6 module system but with Implicit Return and props

classConstructor.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props as arguments

classConstructorContext.description: Adds a default constructor for the class that contains props and context as arguments

emptyState.description: Creates empty state object. To be used in a constructor.

componentWillMount.description: Invoked once, both on the client and server, immediately before the initial rendering occurs

componentDidMount.description: Invoked once, only on the client (not on the server), immediately after the initial rendering occurs.

componentWillReceiveProps.description: Invoked when a component is receiving new props. This method is not called for the initial render. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

shouldComponentUpdate.description: Invoked before rendering when new props or state are being received.

componentWillUpdate.description: Invoked immediately before rendering when new props or state are being received. [DEPRECATION NOTE]: This method is deprecated in React 16.3

componentDidUpdate.description: Invoked immediately after the component's updates are flushed to the DOM.

componentWillUnmount.description: Invoked immediately before a component is unmounted from the DOM.

componentRender.description: When called, it should examine this.props and this.state and return a single child element.

componentSetStateObject.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

componentSetStateFunc.description: Performs a shallow merge of nextState into current state

bindThis.description: Binds the this of a method. To be used inside a constructor

propTypeNode.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array

propTypeNodeRequired.description: Anything that can be rendered: numbers, strings, elements or an array required

propTypeInstanceOf.description: Is an instance of a class prop type

propTypeInstanceOfRequired.description: Is an instance of a class prop type required

propTypeEnum.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum

propTypeEnumRequired.description: Prop type limited to specific values by treating it as an enum required

propTypeOneOfType.description: An object that could be one of many types

propTypeOneOfTypeRequired.description: An object that could be one of many types required

propTypeArrayOf.description: An array of a certain type

propTypeArrayOfRequired.description: An array of a certain type required

propTypeObjectOf.description: An object with property values of a certain type

propTypeObjectOfRequired.description: An object with property values of a certain type required

propTypeObjectOfShape.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time

propTypeObjectOfShapeRequired.description: An object whose keys are known ahead of time required

propTypeShape.description: An object taking on a particular shape

propTypeShapeRequired.description: An object taking on a particular shape required

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate.description: Invoked right before the most recently rendered output is committed to e.g. the DOM. It enables your component to capture current values

getDerivedStateFromProps.description: Invoked after a component is instantiated as well as when it receives new props.

componentDidCatch.description: Error boundaries catch errors during rendering, in lifecycle methods, and in constructors of the whole tree below them.
